sentences.sContent: Sue gave an exclamation as we got a clear sight of the house.
sentences.sCn: 我们清晰地看到房子时，苏发出了一声惊叹。

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ clam(叫， 喊) ＋ ation → 大声喊出来 → 惊呼

trans.tranOther: a sound, word, or short sentence that you say suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited
